Name: The Original Wizard
About the game: The original Wizard tells the story of the association of mages who want to prevent Impeficus one of the strongest mages from conquering the world, the story begins when 4 mages of the association invade the castle of impeficus. What they don't know is that Impeficus has turned their castle into a sea of ​​challenges specially designed for the onslaught of the wizard association. During the attack the mages will encounter more powerful enemies, enemies from their past and even gods. The Dungeon Crawler challenges players with different ways to overcome challenges, doing alchemy, collecting resources, buying and selling items, all to get stronger and learn new elemental spells.
